post.description: Create comment with specials identities wich create new **object** in database

parameters.name: params
parameters.description:
**author** - creator of new *Object*,
**title** - title on comment with *createObject*,
**body** - body on comment with *createObject*,
**permlink** - permlink of comment and **author_permlink** of new created *object*,
**objectName** - *default_name* of *object* and name of first append field of *object*,
**locale** - locale of first append field on *object*,
**isExtendingOpen** - flag on *object* which allow *extend object*,
**isPostingOpen** - flag on *object* which allow add *object* to your own post,
**parentAuthor** - author of post with **Create Object Type**,
**parentPermlink** - permlink of post with **Create Object Type**
---------------**RESPONSE**-----------------
**transactionId** - id of transaction with append after creating object
**author** - author of comment with append which added after creating object
**permlink** - permlink of comment with append which added after creating object
**parentAuthor** - author of comment with *create object*
**parentPermlink** - permlink of comment with *create object*

post.description: Create comment with specials identities wich create new **field** on object in database. Parent comment must be comment with *create Object*

parameters.name: params
parameters.description:
**author** - Creator of new field
**body** -  body on comment with *appendObject*
**title** - title on comment with *appendObject*
**permlink** - permlink of new creatig comment with *appendObject*
**parentAuthor** - author of comment with *createObject*
**parentPermlink** - permlink of comment with *createObject*
**field** - info about append
*   field.name* - name of field(name,title,avatar,addres,link etc.)
*   field.body* - value of field(for ex. if name - bitcoin, if title - descr. for bitcoin etc.)
*   field.locale* - locale of field(en-US, ru-RU etc.)

200.description:
**SUCCESSFUL OPERATION**
**transactionId** - id of transaction with comment which include append object
**author** - author of recently created comment with append object
**permlink** - permlink of recently created comment with append object
**parentAuthor** - author of comment with create object which append related on
**parentPermlink** - permlink of comment with create object which append related on
